name: Phantasma: Remade and Remastered edition
description:
Phantasma: Remade and Remastered edition is a dialogue based, story-driven drama/psychological horror game made on RPG Maker MV. This is the official remake and remaster of the 2021 game of the same name, with updated lore, character sprites, and drawings. It has 2 endings

This is the official sequel to the game Crimson Snow, which you can play here

Plot: 

It's 1990, your husband has bought you a computer as a gift for your 1-year wedding anniversary, but one of the games inside leaves you with a dark fate: Kill a "rebelled angel" who is using you as a vessel to be brought into the human world...

Phantasma: Remade and Remastered edition is aimed at a 14+ audience of individuals and for people who can handle sensitive topics. Viewer discretion is advised...
